p: Most publications on oil nanoencapsulation use the term “nanoencapsulation” [ 2, 37– 42] or “nanoemulsion” [ 10, 43– 48]. Some authors use the term “nanocapsules” [ 49– 51], and others use “nanoparticles” [ 35, 41]. However, both terms originally mean “nanoencapsulation” (Fig. 2), which has been used in its broadest sense, encompassing both the nanocapsules and nanoparticles formation [ 52].
